name: @daily-co/react-native-webrtc

scripts.prepublishOnly: TAG_NAME=$(echo ${npm_package_name} | sed -E 's|^.+/||')-$(date -u +'%Y-%m-%d')-${npm_package_version} && git tag -a -m "${npm_package_name} ${npm_package_version} published to npmjs" ${TAG_NAME} HEAD && git push origin ${TAG_NAME}

description: Daily.co fork of WebRTC for React Native
